biotools.summary:
Deep convolutional neural network built on 3D Voronoi tessellation of protein structures.

VoroCNN is a novel method for local residue-level quality assessment of protein folds. The method is based on a deep convolutional neural network (CNN) constructed on a Voronoi tessellation of 3D molecular structures.

bioschemas.name: VoroCNN
